workflow.name: Events - Cisco Secure Access Fraud / Deny auth
workflow.title: Events - Cisco Secure Access Fraud / Deny auth

properties.description:
This Workflow will fetch DENIED and FRAUD Auth logs from Duo and create a Casebook / Sigthings in SecureX.

This workflow look for email (fraud alert) in IMAP to be trigger. 

Run every hour to get the denied auth.
properties.display_name: Events - Cisco Secure Access Fraud / Deny auth

properties.description: Duo logs are available in the Duo admin logs with a 2 minutes delay.
